name: Red Wumpy
description: A small, round, aggressively red creature waddles here with the confidence of someone who has never considered the consequences of their actions. Its tiny feet make satisfying 'plap plap' sounds on the pavement.
dialogue: The Red Wumpy eyes you suspiciously, as if you owe it money.
It waddles in a small circle, clearly having forgotten what it was doing.

messages: The Red Wumpy goes sailing through the air with a satisfying *thwump* sound!
The Red Wumpy looks hurt and confused.
With a sad 'wump', it waddles away and disappears into the distance.
